parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Path and file name to which to save the sheet format (see Remarks )

title: ISheet.SaveFormat
description: Saves the sheet format in the specified file.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Path and file name to which to save the sheet format (see Remarks )

returns: True if the sheet format is saved to the specified file, false if not
remarks:
You must specify the path, file name, and filename extension to which to save the sheet format. Use .
slddrt
for the filename extension.
Before calling this method, use
IDrawingDoc::ActivateSheet
to make the sheet active.
